nodes.text: A portable uniform fresher was a personal grooming tool used to launder clothes. It was used by Alliance SpecForce interrogators as part of their interrogation technique. When using a method called "acceleration"—wherein they manipulated the prisoner into perceiving time was elapsing faster—interrogators used the portable uniform fresher to freshen their uniform to help the illusion of time passing. They were used in conjunction with a wash-up kit.
